acceptAckCode.displayName:
Error: The HL7 message is invalid. Please correct the HL7 message, and resubmit it.Results from Schematron validation: HCIM_IN_FindCandidates Message Validation Rules From pattern "FindCandidates.queryByParameterPayload" Assert fails: Error BCHCIM.SCH.2.5107. At least two search parameters are required. Valid combinations are Surname and (Date of Birth or Address line 1 or Phone or Postal Code). The Surname is a required search parameter. An empty string is not permitted At: /hl7:HCIM_IN_FindCandidates[1]/hl7:controlActProcess[1]/hl7:queryByParameter[1]/hl7:queryByParameterPayload[1]/hl7:person.name[1]/hl7:value[1]/hl7:family[1] <hl7:family>...</hl7:family> (Line: 1, Column: 1612)
